Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Kimbark
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp.rerouted EB: 63rd, University, 61st, Dorchester, and 63rd; WB: 63rd, Dorchester, 61st, Woodlawn and 63rd, near 63rd/Kimbark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Kimbark due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via: 63rd, University, 61st, Dorchester, and 63rd.

Westbound buses will operate via: 63rd, Dorchester, 61st, Woodlawn and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/40th
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via: California, Archer, Pershing, and California, due to, street blockage, near California/40th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: California, Archer, Pershing, and California, due to, street blockage, near California/40th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
